author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police have announced changes in traffic pattern in the city on Sunday between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. in view of the car festival of the Kottai Sangameshwarar temple.

Heavy vehicles coming from Avanashi Road old flyover, Brooke Bond road, and Trichy road should take the classic tower road near CMCH and Valankulam Bypass road to reach Ukkadam instead of Big Bazaar Street, Clock Tower, and Town Hall stretch.

Vehicles from NH road must reach Raja Street through five corner, and from there two-wheelers could go through Vincent road and heavy vehicles will have to go via Lanka corner, Trichy road, Classic tower, Valangulam bypass road to reach Ukkadam.
title: Traffic diversion today
